channel.title: Game/Console Reviews
channel.description:
Post your game and console reviews!
Format:
[u][b]Game Name (or N/A if reviewing a console):[/b][/u] [u][b]Console:[/b][/u] [u][b]Rating:[/b][/u] [b]***[/b]** (would be 3/5) [u][b]Review:[/b][/u]
(the format for rating is bolded stars out of a total number of stars)
EX
[b]*****[/b]***** = 5/10 [b]****[/b]* = 4/5

item.title: Game/Console Reviews
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:2, topic:359513”]Game Name: Goldeneye 007
Console: Nintendo 64
Rating: ******
Review: This is the mother of first person shooters as we know them today. You will be more happy playing this game than any other game.[/quote](the format for rating is bolded stars out of a total number of stars)

EX

********** = 5/10
***** = 4/5

Read full topic
